properties.entry: SELECT U.ITEM_NO , U.ITEM_CATEGORY , U.EQUIP_ITEM_YN , S.ITEM_NAME , S.ITEM_IMG FROM USER_INVENTORY_LIST U JOIN STORE S ON(U.ITEM_NO = S.ITEM_NO) WHERE U.USER_NO = ?
SELECT USER_NICKNAME , COIN FROM USER_INFORMATION WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFORMATION U SET COIN = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
